comments:

Scenario was deleting some portlet projects in RAD.

It should not be possible for the list to contain null resources so clearing it
should never see null resources and crash like this.  I cannot reproduce this by
simply by clearing a resource set of its resources, so I expect that you have
overrides that are causing this problem.  Years of this working correctly also
seem to argue that point.  In any event, without a reproducible test case, we
have nothing to go on.  

Since you are IBMer, the best we can do is offer debug assistance if you are
unable to track this down.  We've be available next week.
